content: Lambrew is the second of the Black Myth: Wukong Drinks you will likely find, after the Coconut Wine, which is available at the beginning of the game. This Drink offers a slight twist on the Coconut Wine allowing you to heal in a slightly different way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lambrew.md', within the main section titled 'Lambrew'.
The content is as follows:
Lambrew is the second of the Black Myth: Wukong Drinks you will likely find, after the Coconut Wine, which is available at the beginning of the game. This Drink offers a slight twist on the Coconut Wine allowing you to heal in a slightly different way.
